== Kalpetta (M) (803264) ==

Kalpetta (M) is a town in the [[Vythiri]] taluka of [[Wayanad]] district with an area of 40.74 sq. km. and harbouring 7519 households with total population of 31580 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kalpetta]] is at a distance of 0 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 507 km. Male population is 15401 and female population is 16179. Scheduled Caste population is 2200 and Scheduled Tribes population is 3228. Census Location Code of the town is 803264<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Municipality'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 68 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 68 km. Railway station is at Kozhikode at a distance of 68 km.
